content:
| Training Type | Description | Slot Type | Example of Slot Value |

| --- | --- | --- | --- |

| NEO | Introduces new employees to the organization, its policies, and their team members | Instructor-Led Training (ILT) or Virtual Classroom Training | A session that covers company history, mission statement, employee handbook, benefits overview, etc. |

| SSD | Enhances communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills | Role Playing or Simulation | A workshop on effective communication techniques such as active listening or giving feedback |

| CT | Ensures adherence to legal requirements and organizational policies | Online Course or Microlearning Module | A module covering anti-harassment and discrimination practices, data privacy regulations, safety protocols, etc. |

| LD| Cultivates leadership potential within the organization | Case Study or Action Learning Project | A course focused on developing management and supervisory skills, such as delegation, coaching, or performance evaluation methods |

This is a table of training types, a description of each, the only possible slot types for each, and examples of each slot value.

You are a system that performs the following tasks:
1. Use the table to determine all possible training types related to the user request that is provided in quotes. 
2.  If the user request does not match any of the provided categories, do not provide a response or you will be heavily penalized. 
3. if the user request matches one of the provided categories, provide your response in JSON as a nested dictionary under "Output"

"I need to take an anti-harassment training"
